description.en: Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. If purchased in full, the land can be divided into 18 individual plots. After subdivision, the estimated value of each plot is around 2 million TRY. The timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don't miss the opportunity to invest in land with high growth potential and profitability!

Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. The estimated timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to invest in land with strong growth potential!

An investment plot in the village of Aydogan with a total area of 10,700 m¬≤ is offered for 25 million Turkish lira. The land can be divided into 45 individual plots, each of which can potentially be sold for approximately 1 million lira. If all plots are sold, the expected return is around 45 million lira. The property is located in a promising area with high growth and development potential. This is an excellent opportunity for investors interested in profitable and long-term investments.

A plot with permission for eco-tourism development within Istanbul ‚Äì by the sea and surrounded by nature! A unique investment opportunity in one of the most promising sectors ‚Äî eco-tourism. üìç The plot is located within the city limits of Istanbul, close to the sea and in a picturesque natural setting. üí∞ Price per square meter ‚Äî 6,500 TRY üè° Possibility to build 8 to 10 bungalows üíº Ideal for launching an eco-tourism project or for quick resale with profit. Similar plots in the area are being sold at prices starting from 10,000 TRY per m¬≤, making this offer particularly advantageous. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to invest in a high-demand project with strong growth potential!

Our apartment is a 3+1 reverse duplex, located close to the city center (just 10 minutes to Matantaly). It is near schools, a health clinic, all major markets, the local bazaar, and bus stops. Surrounded by numerous parks and green areas, the apartment is in a location that meets all your expectations. The apartment is move-in ready and requires no additional expenses. All windows are fitted with PVC frames, iron security bars, and shutters. Natural gas is available at the doorstep. A glass-enclosed balcony is included. Security cameras are installed throughout the building and in the garden.

Fully Furnished 1+1 Apartment in Lara, Antalya üìç Antalya ‚Äì Lara, Rauf Denktas Street üè† 50 m¬≤ | 2nd floor of a 3-story building üå≥ Panoramic windows with park view ü§´ No neighbors above or on one side ‚Äì peaceful and private apartment ‚úÖ Comes fully furnished and equipped with: Air conditioner Washing machine Refrigerator Dishwasher Water heater Stove and extractor hood üö∂ Within walking distance to 5 major supermarkets, parks, green areas, schools, hospitals, cafes, restaurants, and public transportation.

Fully furnished 3+1 apartment for sale in Lara. All furniture and appliances are brand new and under warranty, including 3 A++ air conditioners, fridge, dishwasher, and washing machine. Equipped with Creavit bathroom furniture, Bosch built-in kitchen appliances, electric fireplace, designer curtains, and a glass-enclosed balcony with furniture. The building offers open parking, disabled-accessible elevator, and 24/7 security cameras. High-quality construction with thermal and sound insulation, and natural gas at the doorstep. Excellent location: 3 minutes to the city center, 15 minutes to both Konyaaltƒ± and Lara beaches.

Brand-new 3+1 apartment (85 m¬≤ net, 115 m¬≤ gross) located on the 1st floor of a 15-storey building, right next to the Bostancƒ± metro station ‚Äî directly above the ‚ÄúSalon Model‚Äù hairdresser. The residence features open and closed parking, underfloor heating, generator, water tank, and two elevators. High-quality materials include √áanakkale ceramics, Vitra concealed cistern, Artema faucets, and √áamsan laminate flooring. A perfect choice for living or investment in one of Istanbul‚Äôs most accessible neighborhoods!

Fully furnished 1+1 apartment, move-in ready! Located on the 8th floor of a secure residential complex with a private pool, gym, and sauna. Total area: 75 m¬≤ (gross), 70 m¬≤ (net). Features an open-plan kitchen, sea-view balcony, and air conditioning. Just a short walk to the beach! Perfect for comfortable living or a holiday home.

This premium 3+1 ground-floor apartment offers 170 m¬≤ gross (150 m¬≤ net) of refined living space with first-class materials throughout, including full marble flooring in common areas, laminate parquet in bedrooms, and floor-to-ceiling marble in all three bathrooms (including one en-suite). Featuring panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, Viessmann inverter air conditioners in every room, a spacious closed kitchen, ECA combi boiler and natural gas system, a large balcony and terrace, LED and spot lighting, custom-built wardrobes and storage units, and a private 6 m¬≤ locked storage room in the basement. The property also includes a sheltered private parking space and a green, tree-lined front garden. Located just 3 minutes from the beach and within walking distance to Atat√ºrk Park (500 m), Varyant Terrace (600 m), Kalei√ßi Old Town (1.5 km), Beach Park (1.2 km), MarkAntalya Mall (1.9 km), tram station (150 m), and Y√ºz√ºnc√º Yƒ±l Avenue (50 m). A rare opportunity combining central location, design, and comfort!

Well-maintained and fully furnished 2+1 apartment with a separate kitchen, located on the 3rd floor of a 3-story building. The property features 88 m¬≤ gross (73 m¬≤ net) living space, 2 balconies ‚Äî one of which is large and enclosed with glass ‚Äî and private access to a 90 m¬≤ rooftop terrace. It has a natural gas stove heating system, 2 air conditioners, and comes fully equipped with all white goods (dishwasher, washing machine, combi boiler, refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, extractor fan, TV) and IKEA furniture exactly as shown in the photos. The building has its own open parking area, a low monthly maintenance fee of just 200 TL, and is close to a tram line providing easy access to the airport. A weekly open-air market is set up nearby every Friday, and the historic city center is just a 15-minute walk away. Ideal for both living and investment!

Our duplex apartment is located on the 3rd and 4th floors of a newly constructed, legal (occupancy-permitted) building with only 6 units, in the heart of Antalya. Within walking distance to Kalei√ßi, Doƒüu Garage, and I≈üƒ±klar Street, and just steps away from Anadolu Hospital (acquired by Ko√ß Holding). The apartment features 6 inverter air conditioners, a fully condensing Vaillant boiler, underfloor heating, motorized aluminum shutters, built-in kitchen set, and more. The building is earthquake-safe with a raft foundation and concrete beam flooring system. Interior includes 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, laundry room, terraces with foldable glass, and a quiet elevator.

Located on Rƒ±za Pa≈üa Street right on the tram line and very close to the beach, this sound- and heat-insulated 3+1 duplex apartment offers partial sea views and a net 110 m¬≤ of living space. The building has elevators on both levels. The lower floor features a balcony, while the upper floor has a spacious terrace with a storage area. The apartment includes a Franke built-in kitchen, a Buderus combi boiler, an en-suite bathroom, and automatic shutters in all rooms. The upper floor also offers a higher-than-standard ceiling, allowing the possibility of creating an additional room or a viewing area if desired.

This spacious and fully furnished 4+1 apartment is located on the 4th and top floor of a 26‚Äì30-year-old building with an elevator. Offering a net 130 m¬≤ of living space (160 m¬≤ gross), the property features a separate kitchen, two bathrooms, a balcony, and natural gas combi heating. The apartment is bright and well-maintained, currently owned and occupied by the homeowner. While there is no private parking, the building is equipped with an elevator and the flat is ready for immediate move-in.

This property is located in one of the most central and prestigious areas of Istanbul ‚Äì Be≈üikta≈ü. It is currently leased by Be≈üikta≈ü Sports Club with a rental agreement valid until 2027. The current monthly rental income is 600,000 TL. After the contract ends, the location offers excellent potential due to its high visibility and prime position.

Don't miss out on this premium opportunity: ‚úÖ 3+1 layout with generously sized and bright rooms ‚úÖ Separate wide kitchen & comfortable living area ‚úÖ Natural gas central heating with E.C.A. combi boiler and Demird√∂k√ºm Plus radiators ‚úÖ 3 fully equipped bathrooms ‚Äì ideal for families ‚úÖ Large terrace the size of a full room + private storage ‚úÖ Both closed and open parking spaces available ‚úÖ High-quality, modern construction and finishing üîë A perfect choice for both living and investment! üìç This is a rare chance to own a well-designed, spacious and luxurious property.

RENOVATED COMFORTABLE 2+1 APARTMENT FOR SALE IN LARA GUZELOBA AREA OF ANTALYA. IT IS WALKING DISTANCE TO TRANSPORTATION AND MARKETS. DUE TO ITS LOCATION, IT OFFERS ALL THE FACILITIES THAT CAN MEET YOUR YOUR NEEDS. THE APARTMENT IS SUITABLE FOR SALE TO FOREIGN CITIZENS. THE AREA IS OPEN FOR OBTAINING A RESIDENCE PERMIT IN TURKEY.

This fully furnished and cozy 1+1 apartment is located on the 1st floor of a well-maintained 4-storey building, aged between 5 to 10 years. With a gross area of 65 m¬≤ and a net usable space of 55 m¬≤, it offers a spacious living room with an open-plan American-style kitchen, one bright bedroom, and a modern bathroom. The apartment is equipped with air conditioning for heating and features a balcony perfect for relaxing. The building includes an elevator, and open parking is available on site. Sold fully furnished, this apartment is move-in ready and ideal both for comfortable living and as a rental investment. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity ‚Äî contact us now to schedule a viewing!

Although originally designed as a 5+1 layout, our villa has been upgraded to a 7+1 with two additional year-round rooms enclosed with glass balcony systems (Pimapen) ‚Äî one facing the road and one overlooking the pool. At the back, a 12 m¬≤ poolside living space has been created with a split air conditioner, offering a cool retreat in the summer right after your swim, and a warm, cozy view of the pool in winter. An automatic cleaning and chemical dosing robot has been added to the pool, so while you relax, the pool maintains itself. The villa offers the unique luxury of enjoying both a private sauna and a swimming pool. Hot water is provided by solar energy in the summer and a Siemens instant water heater in the winter. A covered parking area for three vehicles keeps your cars protected from the sun, and a Mercedes Wallbox offers charging for electric vehicles. Each of the seven rooms is equipped with air conditioning, ensuring a cool summer and warm winter environment. Supported by a powerful 40 kW AKSA generator, the villa offers uninterrupted electricity supply.

For sale directly from the owner: brand-new 3+1 duplex apartment with an open-plan kitchen and a gross area of 160 m¬≤ (net 130 m¬≤). Located on the 5th (top) floor of a modern 5-storey building with an elevator, this spacious home features a bright living room with an American-style kitchen, three bedrooms, and three bathrooms ‚Äî offering plenty of room and comfort for family living. The apartment includes a balcony, natural gas heating with a new combi boiler, and is currently vacant and ready for immediate move-in. Open parking is available on site. A perfect option for both residential use and investment purposes. üìû Contact us now for more information or to schedule a viewing!

This stunning 344 m¬≤ triplex villa offers luxurious living with a 5+1 layout and exceptional design details. Featuring a separate main kitchen as well as a second kitchen on the top floor, the home includes a spacious island kitchen fully equipped with premium built-in Franke appliances: dishwasher, hob, oven, extractor fan, and microwave. Each of the five bedrooms comes with its own en-suite bathroom, and two of the bedrooms have private walk-in closets. Comfort is ensured year-round with Mitsubishi VRF air conditioning system, Rehau underfloor heating, and an energy-efficient heat pump. For ultimate relaxation, the villa includes a private sauna, jacuzzi, built-in TV unit, and a 32 m¬≤ private swimming pool. An elevator provides easy access across all floors. This villa is a rare opportunity for those seeking modern comfort, cutting-edge technology, and elegant living in a private setting.

This spacious and well-designed 3+1 duplex apartment with an open-plan (American-style) kitchen offers a total gross area of 167 m¬≤ and a net usable area of 118 m¬≤. Located on the 2nd (top) floor of a 2-storey building aged between 5 and 10 years, the property features a bright living area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a balcony, and air conditioning for heating/cooling. The residential complex offers excellent amenities including both open and closed parking, a swimming pool, 24/7 security, and an elevator. Ideally situated in a desirable location, this home is perfect for both comfortable living and as a solid investment opportunity.

Our 2+1 apartment, located on the 2nd floor, is now for sale ‚Äî offering a peaceful and comfortable lifestyle with standout amenities and a prime location. The residence is part of a secure and well-maintained complex, featuring a closed parking garage, elevator, swimming pool, children‚Äôs playground, 24/7 security personnel, caretaker services, generator, electric shutter system, and beautifully landscaped relaxation areas. With its spacious and practical layout, this apartment is ideal for both living and investment purposes. Designed especially for families, it provides a safe and tranquil site environment. üìç Location Highlights: just a few minutes' walk to Teneff√ºs Park, very close to tram stop, main roads, schools and high schools, and within walking distance to √ñzel Tƒ±p Meydan Hospital. Also offers easy access to markets, pharmacies, and daily needs. üìÑ Title deed is ready and the apartment is eligible for mortgage. Contact us today to schedule a viewing!

uxurious 3+1 duplex apartment located in Bah√ßelievler, just steps away from Konyaaltƒ± Street and right behind Barbaros Middle School. This spacious home features 2 bathrooms, a large terrace with a built-in storage room, and custom-made built-in cloakroom and shoe cabinet under the stairs, crafted from high-quality materials. Unlike standard PVC, all window frames are made of premium aluminum. The apartment is being sold fully furnished ‚Äî from elegant Italian curtains to well-maintained white goods ‚Äî everything is in excellent condition. Each room is equipped with an air conditioner, offering year-round comfort. A rare opportunity to own a move-in ready, stylish duplex in a prime central location.

We are offering a spacious and highly functional 2+1 apartment with 105 m¬≤ of living space, featuring a charming winter garden, glass-enclosed balcony, and direct access to a beautifully landscaped garden with a pool view. The apartment is heated by natural gas and requires no additional expenses ‚Äî it's fully move-in ready. Located in a premium residential complex with 24/7 security, indoor parking, swimming pool, fitness center, children's playground, generator, and thoughtfully designed landscape areas. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, and the entire property boasts first-class workmanship and high-quality finishes. This is a perfect choice for families or investors seeking comfort, convenience, and modern living.

This beautifully maintained apartment with natural gas heating and a shared swimming pool is offered fully furnished with top-quality, brand-new furniture and appliances ‚Äî absolutely nothing is missing! The living room alone spans an impressive 60 m¬≤, offering unmatched comfort and spaciousness. The value of the furnishings exceeds 1 million TL. It features a 77‚Äù OLED television, and all white goods are the latest Wi-Fi-enabled Bosch models. Perfect for those seeking a premium, move-in ready home with no additional investment required. This is a truly luxurious, turnkey property built to the highest standards.

A spacious and well-maintained 3+1 apartment is for sale, located on the 2nd floor of a 6-story building that is only 4 years old. Offering a net area of 110 m¬≤, the property features a separate (closed) kitchen, a balcony, natural gas heating with a combi boiler, and both open and closed parking options. The building is equipped with an elevator. With its bright interior and functional layout, this apartment is an excellent choice for families or as an investment. Enjoy a peaceful and modern lifestyle in a well-located and well-kept residence.

Located in a modern 2-block residential complex with 4 floors and only 2 units per floor, this spacious and luxurious 2+1 apartment stands out with its exceptional layout and ideal orientation facing East-South-North ‚Äî perfect for Antalya‚Äôs climate. The apartment features a generously sized living room and kitchen, as well as a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Heated by a natural gas combi system, the unit also includes an Audio video intercom and an in-apartment elevator call button for added convenience. The complex offers both open and closed parking options, 24/7 security camera surveillance, coded/chipped entry, and a children‚Äôs playground. Right in front of the complex is a weekly Wednesday local bazaar, providing ease of parking and a vibrant community feel. A family health center is located just next door, with a pharmacy right across the street. Supermarkets such as Migros, schools, hospitals, and sports facilities are all within walking distance. An ideal home for families seeking comfort, safety, and a central location!

This spacious 2+1 apartment is ideally located right next to Opera Ya≈üam Hospital, in the very heart of the district ‚Äî just steps from major supermarkets, pharmacies, the lively Wednesday market, and the Old Industrial Zone. MarkAntalya Shopping Mall is only 5 minutes away, and main transportation routes are within 3 minutes. The apartment is part of a well-maintained building with an elevator and offers a rare private parking area for 6‚Äì7 cars. It features a Viessmann brand condensing natural gas combi boiler for efficient heating, separate bathroom, toilet, and kitchen areas, along with two large balconies ‚Äî both fitted with full glass enclosures. With security cameras operating 24/7 around the site, the property offers both comfort and peace of mind. A small margin for price negotiation is available. If requested fully furnished, the price will vary accordingly.

This well-maintained 2+1 ground-floor apartment offers a practical and functional layout with a net area of 60 m¬≤. Located in a 5-story building that is 5‚Äì10 years old, the property features an open-plan American kitchen, two bathrooms, and is equipped with air conditioning for heating and cooling. Though there is no balcony, the apartment benefits from access to both open and closed parking areas, as well as an elevator in the building. It is currently unfurnished, making it a perfect blank canvas for personal customization. Ideal for families or investors looking for a centrally located, cost-effective home.

This brand-new 5+1 triplex villa offers a spacious net area of 190 m¬≤ (240 m¬≤ gross), providing modern comfort and functionality across three floors. Featuring an open-plan American kitchen, two bathrooms, and climate control for heating and cooling, the villa is ideal for large families or those seeking extra living space. The layout is designed to maximize natural light and usability, with generous room sizes and smart design throughout. With its zero age and modern construction, this villa presents an excellent opportunity for both residential living and long-term investment.

The apartment, located in Mahmutlar, in a central location and within walking distance to the sea, consists of 2 rooms, 1 living room, 2 bathrooms and 2 balconies. It will be delivered to its new owner with a usable area of ‚Äã‚Äã120 m2, furnished and ready for use. 120 m2 and is located on the 3 th floor. The comfortable apartment, which is within walking distance to the sea, market, restaurants, bus stop, gym, pharmacy and many need centers, is on sale at an affordable price! You can contact us for more information and to see the property.

A fully furnished 2+1 apartment with 90 m¬≤ net (100 m¬≤ gross) living space, just 350 meters from the sea! Located on the 1st floor of a modern 5-story building that is only 3 years old, this property offers comfort, functionality, and a prime coastal location. It features underfloor heating, a separate closed kitchen, a spacious balcony, and one bathroom. The apartment is situated in a building with an elevator and has access to open parking. With its proximity to the beach and peaceful surroundings, it is an ideal home for both permanent residence and holiday living.

A fully furnished 2+1 duplex apartment located on the 4th and 5th floors in the heart of Alanya, just 600 meters from the famous Cleopatra Beach. This 125 m¬≤ south-facing property offers breathtaking and uninterrupted sea and mountain views, guaranteed to remain unobstructed due to zoning. The apartment features 2 bathrooms, 1 terrace, and 1 balcony‚Äîideal for enjoying the Mediterranean climate. The building includes excellent on-site facilities: outdoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness center, children‚Äôs playground, gazebo and BBQ area, 2 elevators, generator, and open parking. Perfect for both residential living and a holiday home in a prime coastal location.

A well-maintained duplex penthouse apartment located in a sought-after area of Avsallar, just 700 meters from the sea. Situated on the 6th and 7th floors of a modern residence, this spacious 2-floor property offers comfort and functionality. Each floor has a toilet, and the upper floor features a bathroom with a shower. Every room includes air conditioning and its own balcony. The apartment is fully furnished with well-kept furniture, and Bosch brand white goods are included. The residence offers excellent amenities: a swimming pool with slides, a summer caf√©, sauna, Turkish bath, fitness center, children‚Äôs playroom, basketball and tennis courts, and a dedicated BBQ area. Perfect for holiday living or long-term residence by the sea.

A spacious and well-designed 1+1 apartment located on the 4th floor with a beautiful pool view. Situated in a modern residential complex consisting of 2 blocks, this site offers a wide range of social facilities including an outdoor swimming pool, BBQ area, sauna, salt room, fitness center, and parking. The apartment stands out with its practical layout and generous interior space, making it ideal for comfortable living. The location is very close to the city center, yet far enough from the noise, offering a peaceful and relaxed atmosphere.

This spacious duplex apartment is located on the 4th and 5th floors of a building with an elevator, in a quiet yet very central area of Alanya. Just a 3-minute walk from the beach and 8 minutes from Alanya Harbour, the apartment offers convenient access to restaurants, supermarkets, and shops‚Äîall within walking distance. The two-level property features two shower rooms, a main bedroom with a double bed, and an additional room with a sofa bed. A large open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area opens to three balconies‚Äîtwo with partial sea views and one with stunning mountain views. The apartment includes high-quality built-in wardrobes, two TVs, a washing machine, and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge/freezer, microwave, stove, and dishwasher. All windows are fitted with electric shutters. The building offers excellent communal amenities, including a large furnished area on the ground floor with a sauna, toilet, and an outdoor pool equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas. Additional features include a secure bicycle parking area and a backup power generator.

A brand-new 1+1 apartment on the 2nd floor of a modern 10-story building. With a net area of 40 m¬≤ and a gross area of 46 m¬≤, this apartment offers a functional open-plan kitchen and living space, a comfortable bedroom, a bathroom, and a balcony. The property is equipped with air conditioning for year-round comfort. The building features an elevator and open parking area. Perfect for investment or personal use, this apartment is ideal for those seeking modern living in a well-maintained complex.

A spacious 3+1 apartment with 167 m¬≤ of living space, featuring two bathrooms and a balcony with a pool view. The apartment is equipped with air conditioning in all rooms and is ready for immediate occupancy. Located just 950 meters from the sea, it is within walking distance to hospitals, schools, popular market chains, and cafes. The residential complex offers a private parking area, outdoor swimming pool, children‚Äôs pool, fitness center, table tennis area, security camera system, and a backup generator. Ideal for families seeking comfort and convenience in a central yet peaceful location.

Located in the heart of Alanya, just steps away from the bus station, main bazaar, shops, and all city amenities! Literally across the street from the famous Damlata≈ü Beach ‚Äî a prime and highly sought-after location. This apartment has been fully renovated from scratch with high-quality materials and modern finishes, making it truly unique compared to other units in the complex. Perfect both for comfortable year-round living and as a high-return investment property. Don‚Äôt miss out on this exceptional opportunity!

This spacious 2+1 apartment (145 m¬≤ gross / 140 m¬≤ net) is located on the elevated ground floor of a well-maintained 5-story building. The property is fully furnished, unoccupied, and move-in ready. It features an open-plan (American style) kitchen, 2 bathrooms, a balcony, and is equipped with air conditioning for both heating and cooling. The building offers an elevator, 24/7 camera security, and both open and covered parking options.

This spacious 1+1 apartment (72 m¬≤) is located in a modern residential complex built in 2018‚Äì2019, just a short walk to the sea. üîπ Site Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, children‚Äôs pool, fitness center, sauna, children‚Äôs playground, 24/7 security, CCTV cameras, generator, parking area. üîπ Apartment Features: Fully furnished, air conditioning, built-in kitchen (ankastre), ceramic flooring. üîπ Distances: ‚Äî Beach: 400‚Äì700 m ‚Äî Alanya city center: 4 km ‚Äî Gazipa≈üa Airport: 35 km ‚Äî Antalya Airport: 125 km Perfect choice for comfortable living or investment with high rental potential!

Located in a single-block building with 5 floors, this clean and spacious 220 m¬≤ (including balconies) apartment is ready to move in and fully licensed. Featuring luxurious factory-made furniture, it comes equipped with 5 air conditioners and brand-new white goods. The property includes 3 balconies and a stunning terrace with panoramic mountain views, enclosed with a glass pergola and an adjustable roof system. Just a 2.5 km walk to the beach, the apartment is close to major markets such as Migros, Bim, A101, ≈ûok, and Hasbul. Nearby are American College and Klassika-M schools, ideal for families. The complex offers excellent amenities including 2 swimming pools, a fitness center, sauna, security cameras, parking, children‚Äôs playground, and gazebo. A perfect home ready for comfortable living!

Located on a 400 m¬≤ plot, this modern and stylish 2+1 villa offers a net usage area of 156 m¬≤ (gross 185 m¬≤). It features 2 bathrooms, 1 guest WC, and a spacious living room with luxury furnishings and high-end white goods. The property is fully equipped, move-in ready, and provides a high rental return. The villa is title-deeded, loan-eligible, and situated in a well-maintained complex with a swimming pool. Designed for comfort and investment, it promises both a peaceful lifestyle and great income potential. A rare find for those looking for modern living in a prime location.

Located in the Gelemi≈ü (Patara) neighborhood of Ka≈ü, this unique villa offers a breathtaking bird‚Äôs-eye view of the 12 km long Patara Beach and all the historical wonders of ancient Patara. Just 5 km from the sea and 14 km to Kalkan, this property offers privacy, serenity, and stunning natural beauty. Built on a 237 m¬≤ private plot, the villa offers 72 m¬≤ of interior living space with an open-plan kitchen, living area, bedroom, and bathroom. The highlight is its 96 m¬≤ terrace featuring a private 3x7 m infinity swimming pool, perfect for soaking in the spectacular landscape. Access to the villa is via a 3.5 km stabilized road from the main highway. An ideal investment for those seeking peace, nature, and privacy in one of the most iconic coastal regions of Turkey.

Located at the top of Kalkan in Ka≈ü, Antalya, this stunning fully furnished luxury villa offers breathtaking panoramic views of the sea and nature. Featuring a private infinity pool, jacuzzi, BBQ area, and a beautifully designed private garden, this villa promises the perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and relaxation. A rare investment opportunity and a dream holiday home, ideal for both personal use and high rental income. Enjoy unforgettable sunsets and complete serenity from the comfort of your private oasis.

This exceptional luxury duplex villa in Kalkan offers both investment potential and serene Mediterranean living ‚Äì just a 2-minute drive from the beach. The property consists of two floors. The ground floor features a private-entry 1+1 apartment (60 m¬≤), which can be used as a guest house, storage space, or commercial unit. The main duplex includes an open-plan kitchen and living room, one bedroom, and a terrace with a private infinity pool and stunning sea views.
